author: andreas
content: No, I don't print them, I don't sell them, but if you want one of my images printed, just do it yourself. It's all Creative Commons BY-NC-ND. You can find the full sizes on Flickr. You may have to search through my Photostream, but everything published since mid-2010 is there, albeit not necessarily in the order as published on the blog. Of course that means printing a JPEG and that's often not the best way to do it. If you really, really want to print a color image and you can't get it to print well from the JPEG, please contact me, I may be able to supply you with a Photoshop file or a RAW file. If you want a signed copy, well, we can meet in Vienna, you bring along the print and I'll sign it ðŸ˜„
